title: Jennifer Lawrence pops into a skin clinic just days before her wedding to Cooke Maroney
text:
She's inching closer and closer to her wedding date to her fiancé, Cooke Maroney.

Jennifer Lawrence stepped out on Friday morning in New York just days before her wedding to give her skin some TLC.

The 29-year-old Hunger Games alum hurried inside to the skin clinic looking fall chic ahead of her treatments.

Busy woman: Jennifer Lawrence stepped out on Friday morning in New York just days before her wedding to give her skin some TLC

She wore a red plaid button up underneath a red and brown Prada coat that she held closed to keep herself warm.

The Oscar winning actress kept is casual in a pair of black pants and black slides while carrying a black bucket purse.

She had her hair thrown up in a messy bun and donned a bare face before her facial.

Cold day: She wore a red plaid button up underneath a red and brown Prada coat that she held closed to keep herself warm

The star is set to marry her longtime love Cooke, 33, any day now.

'He's just the best person I've ever met in my whole life,' Lawrence said during an interview with Entertainment Tonight. 'It was a very, very easy decision.'

Back at the end of September, she shared her Amazon wedding registry with fans with a list of all things perfect for hosting, cooking, travel and more.

'Planning a wedding is so exciting, but it can be overwhelming. For anyone else needing a little inspiration, I thought it would be fun to collaborate with Amazon to share a few of my favorite registry wish-list items. It's so easy, and you can find everything you need all in one place,' she said about her registry.

Details: The Oscar winning actress kept is casual in a pair of black pants and black slides while carrying a black bucket purse

The two lovebirds got engaged at just under a year of dating after being introduced by mutual friends.

They are constantly spotted out hand-in-hand while out on dates or strolling through the city.

Prior to their relationship, the Silver Linings Playbook star split from her ex Darren Aronofsky. Darren was the director of her movie mother! and they grew close while filming but later parted ways back in November 2017.

Happy: Jennifer and Cooke laugh as they head out for a massage at Water Lily Spa in Soho before heading to lunch back in September
description:
Jennifer Lawrence stepped out on Friday morning in New York just days before her wedding to give her skin some TLC.
The 29-year-old Hunger Games alum hurried inside to the skin clinic.
